* Set fields service catalog task dynamically using the hidden variables on Service catalog item. * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-215 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO, Service Request * History * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 5 July 2018: Initial implementation **/ var assignmentGrp = ''; var assignTo = ''; var shortDescTemplate = ''; var descTemplate = ''; assignmentGrp = current.variables.sc_task_assignmentGroupName; assignTo = current.variables.sc_task_assignToName; if (current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate) { shortDescTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_shortDescTemplate.toString(); } if (current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate) { descTemplate = current.variables.sc_task_descriptionTemplate.toString(); } var assignmentGroup_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user_group', assignmentGrp); var assignTo_id = getSysIDByName('sys_user', assignTo); var shortDesc = replaceStringIntempalte(shortDescTemplate, current); var desc = replaceStringIntempalte(descTemplate, current); if (assignmentGrp && assignmentGroup_id) { task.assignment_group = assignmentGroup_id; } if (assignTo && assignTo_id) { task.assigned_to = assignTo_id; } if (shortDescTemplate && shortDesc) { task.short_description = shortDesc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task SHORT description, and Cat Item'); } if (descTemplate && desc) { task.description = desc; } else { gs.warn('>>> CAN NOT set task Description'); } // Set custom field for the requested For on sc_req_item var requestedForName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_for); //current.u_item_requested_for = requestedForName; current.setValue('u_item_requested_for', current.variables.u_requested_for, requestedForName); var requestedByName = getUserNameById(current.variables.u_requested_by); current.setValue('u_item_requested_by', current.variables.u_requested_by, requestedByName); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_for', current.variables.u_notify_req_for, current.variables.u_notify_req_for ); current.setValue('u_item_notify_requested_by', current.variables.u_notify_me, current.variables.u_notify_me ); function getSysIDByName(tableName, name) { var sysid = ''; var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName); gr.get('name', name); return gr.sys_id; } function getUserNameById(sysId) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); gr.get('sys_id', sysId); return gr.user_name; } function replaceStringIntempalte(templateStr, current) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 1 on replaceStringIntempalte()'); var retVal = templateStr; var rxp = /\{([^}]+)\}/g; var curMatch; while (curMatch = rxp.exec( templateStr )) { //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT 2 on replaceStringIntempalte() --' + curMatch[1]); var key = '{' + curMatch[1] + '}'; if (curMatch[1] == 'short_description') { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.' + curMatch[1])); } else { retVal = retVal.replace( key, GlideEvaluator.evaluateString('current.variables.' + curMatch[1])); } } //gs.warn('>>> CHECK POINT on replaceStringIntempalte() -- (' + retVal + ') --- with Template: (' + templateStr +')' ); return retVal; }98b96f90c0a800666b58ec516f330397wf_activity240d4e03db231300f72fe04a48961903300sys_variable_valueJames.Jose2018-07-31
